name: Super Looper
description:
Bounce through 10 levels in this hopefully-not-too-short puzzler for Ludum Dare 47!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to move

Space to restart

Bounce on trampolines

Get caught in a softlock (bouncing continually on two trampolines) to proceed.

Not really much to say about this one. Maybe I'm doing these jams a little too frequently...? Eh, whatever, I can stop whenever I want to. (Which I don't want to!) I had plenty of fun in this one and I can't wait to play some of the other games! :)
